summary: A notorious terrorist manipulates an Indian army major's jilted lover into helping him obtain a classified military code.
cast: Anil Kapoor|Madhuri Dixit|Namrata Shirodkar|Om Puri|Rohini Hattangadi|Farida Jalal|Shivaaji Satam|Danny Denzongpa|K.D. Chandran|Prabhu Deva|Sudhir Joshi|Girish Karnad|Abdul Qayyoom Khan|Kulbhushan Kharbanda|Viju Khote|Dhananjay Mandrekar|Lata Mangeshkar|Govind Namdeo|Mukesh Rishi|Yashpal Sharma|Anjan Srivastav|Neeraj Vora
title: Pukar
